title: League has dragon slayer skins, but we need an actual dragon slaying champ
body:
Dorick the dragon slayer Dorick would be a warrior/tank champion.
HP584+93 6.87/5sec +0.49
MP 240+65 5.01/5sec +0.37
AD51+2.18
Atk speed: 0.712+ 1%
Armour 27+1.11
MR+ 23+1.28
Speed 335
Melee
Passive Dragon's spirit.
Survives at the harshest environments, gaining 2/4/6/8 AD per nearby ally and 5/10/15/20 Armour and MR for each nearby enemy.
Q: Incise 65mp 12/11.5/11/10.5/10sec
An ability strong enough to penetrate the scales of dragons. Dealing AD+30/45/60/75/90 Physical damage. Evading 15/20/25/30/35 armor.
W: Dragon Scaled Armor 25/24.75/24.5/24.25/24sec 75mp
Passive: Coats his armor with the scales of dragons slain. Increasing armor and MR by 10/15/20/25/30. Killing or assisting in killing the Dragon of the rift permanently increases passive armor by 5
Active: Activate to take 10/20/30/40/50+10%armor less damage from champions Lasts 2/2.75/3.5/4.25/5sec.
E: Flaming Blade 75mp 15sec (not effected by CDR)
Passive: attacks burn the enemies soul dealing 10/13/16/19/22 +10% AD as TD over 3sec Does not stack.
Active: Slashes the enemy with the flaming blade which deals AD+ 25/50/75/100/125 TD. 
R: Drakel Execution. 125mp 150/125/100sec CD
On Dragon: Deals 150/200/250% AD +100/200/300 TD. Slaying grants Glory for 90sec 
Glory: Being proud and more encouraged after slaying a dragon, Dorick gains 10% movement speed and 15/30/45 AD.
On champion: 1. Deals 12.5/15/17.5% enemy current and missing hp +50%AD as mixed Damage.
                                                                                     OR
                         2. Deals 125/250/375 magic damage + 7.5/10/12.5 Max hp as Physical damage that evades 20/35/50% enemy armour.

replies.body: YORICK AND DORICK TOP LANE SYNERGY
Dorick kills shyvana yorick digs the grave.

This is the third champ you've made today dude, how many more do you have?
XD
well, when im bored in tutoring classes(yes i am asian) i draw up these champs... and im smart as heck and there is nothing for me to do at home...its a new hobby i picked up i guess :/

Fair enough, you're pretty good at these, just some of them need some balancing
But this one is a good idea, I like the sound of a dragon slayer
yea i mean we have shyvana... there should be like a rengar and kha'zix mission between them.
i think u need to cahnge the name
Like the fact he's called Dorick sounds too... Yorickish. Suggestions: Xiuhcoatl (meaning fire serpent or weapon of destruction), Drakon, Volthoom???? Just some ideas, hope it helps.
Like the jinx and vi/caitlyn thing
